timeline.message:
Split each error to their own "append" method

Remove manual newlines from "conflicts" and "breaks" descriptions

Improved the look of error descriptions

FabricStatusTree: lines starting with "INFO:" now get appended to the last child as a sub-child
Unsatisfied "depends", "breaks" and "conflicts" now use the dependency candidate's name instead of the dependency's mod ID

Improve some wording, clean up console output

Error descriptions now have info icon and are bold and brash

Main error node now displays dependency candidate mod name if available
Mod names are now wrapped in double quotes rather than single quotes

Revert "Mod names are now wrapped in double quotes rather than single quotes"

This reverts commit 043afe60889ed2ad410b8487ad3ce72024fa9914.
